CHAT.comment: THOMAS JOE MILLER-EL, Petitioner v. JANIE COCKRELL, DIRECTOR, TEXAS DEPARTMENT OF CRIMINAL JUSTICE, INSTITUTIONAL DIVISION.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:03 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF SETH P. WAXMAN ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF GENA A. BUNN ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF SETH P. WAXMAN ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 12:01 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
